name: 餐旅消費者行為研究
goals: Become familiar with the motivation of consumers and their own decision and procedure of decision making and purchasing.
Appreciate different approaches to the study of tourist behavior.
Make connections between theory and practice in the study of tourist behavior.

Realize that tourism demand continues to evolve, and that this evolutionary process should be understood by tourism researchers, marketers, policy makers, and other stakeholders within the tourism industry.
prerequisite: ◎Unavailable for M.A. program students (M.A. program courses excepted) and B.A. program students.
